alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Moore (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 13 at 4:34PM CDT until August 13 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM CDT FOR MOORE AND LINCOLN COUNTIES... At 433 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Fayetteville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Fayetteville, Lynchburg, Tims Ford Lake, Lincoln, Mulberry, Chestnut Ridge, Howell, Belleville, Hurdlow and Elora. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
